entry.title: Russia Pummels Ukraine's Mykolaiv, Killing Top Businessman
entry.content: The southern port city suffered some of the worst barrages of the war, while Moscow reported a drone attack on the headquarters of its Black Sea Fleet.

entry.title: War With Russia Enters New Phase as Ukraine Readies Southern Counterblow
entry.content: A Ukrainian offensive to reclaim a key port city could be a turning point in the conflict, with success reinforcing support for Kyivâ€™s fight in parts of the West.
